Text.Page: My friend, I wish to investigate the Casian Tree, but the path isn't safe. Might I prevail upon your combat skill to help me reach my destination?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Of course."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Splendid. It's northwest of here. Let me know when you're ready to depart.

Breathtaking, isn't it? Oh, and lookâ€”a small shrine.

I suspect this investigation will prove most stimulating.
